message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  What do you say?
I'll take 80, you can have 20. It's a decent offer, don't be greedy!
Okay, let's be reasonable. 50/50 seems fair, considering the inflation.  What do you say?
I'll take 90, you can have 10. You can't be serious with 50/50 after rejecting my 80/20 offer!
I'll take 40, you get 60.  It's a compromise, but with inflation, I can't afford to be greedy.  Let's end this.
